Author: Naida_BR
Title: ‚ö°‚ö°[ANN][PRE ICO] Lux Ant Digital Bank üî•üî•
Body: ALux "Bank" hears like a centralized project to me. You have many features that make the project impressive like the payment card that can be used for payments.  I am skeptical what this project can bring to the society as I cannot see any difference from the current Banking System, but I am going to have a close eye to the progress of Lux Ant Digital Bank project.
